headline.main: R.A.F. FIGHTER PILOT PRAISES U.S. PLANES; Arriving Here, He Tells of High Regard for Our Bombers

lead_paragraph: Flight Lieutenant Richard H. Hilary, 22-year-old fighter pilot of the Royal Air Force who was shot down in a fight over the English Channel, arrived here yesterday with a group of 190 visitors from Great Britain, including fifty-five young women who will work in the British Embassy in Washington.
